import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import connectComponent from '@/connect' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import './index.scss' import IosBg from '../../assets/images/ios-bg.jpg' import WebBg from '../../assets/images/web-bg.jpg' import { getParentDetails } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/PnCampaign' import { SendCampaign } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { parentID: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview'], } componentWillMount = () => { let { params: { parent_id }, } = this.props.match parent_id = parseInt(parent_id, 10) this.setState({ parentID: parent_id, }) if (!this.props.CreateCampaign.data) { getParentDetails(parent_id) } } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } sendCampaign = async () => { const { data } = this.props.CreateCampaign const { campaign_id, parentID } = this.state const response = await SendCampaign({ campaign_id: parseInt(campaign_id, 10) }) const requests = [] if (_.isArray(data)) { _.forEach(data, part => { requests.push(SendCampaign({ campaign_id: part.campaign_id || part.campaignId })) }) } await Promise.all(requests) console.log('step 5 res', response) } render() { const { steps } = this.state return (
